title: Thoeba
description: Thoeba is a creature of light. As all things must be in balance, when the Energy created her kind it also created the darkness. Thoebaâ€™s world fell to darkness forcing her to flee. She came to Earth to protect the Energy, losing everything in the process.Darkness has found a way to follow her and threatens to take this world as well.With only humans as allies, can she succeed?
author: Donna Milward
